did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Free Will Baptist Church of Middlesex records, 1858-1895.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Free Will Baptist Church of Middlesex (Middlesex, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of monthly church meetings, later called conferences (1858-1895); annual church meetings (1867-1895); and covenant meetings; various membership lists (1859-1894); and a subscription list.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Free Will Baptist Church of Middlesex was incorporated on December 3, 1858. No organizational date is available. A meeting house was built at Middlesex Center in 1845, and a new church was dedicated on November 8, 1883.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of monthly church meetings, later called conferences (1858-1895); annual church meetings (1867-1895); and covenant meetings; various membership lists (1859-1894); and a subscription list.
